<Text: The malunga is a single-stringed musical bow played by the Siddi of India, who are the descendants of East African immigrants.>

Text: Malunga:  It is struck with a stick and, as with the "berimbau" of Brazil, the hand holding the stick also holds a rattle (in the case of the "malunga" the rattle, called "mai misra").
